chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
k: nat
n: nat
P: (nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)))%type
i: nat
x: pos n
p: nat
v: Vector.t nat n
st: (nat * Vector.t nat n)%type

Goal:
(i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (i, v) -[k]-> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (p, v) -[k']-> st

Premises:

Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive mm_instr (X : Set) : Set := mm_inc : X -> mm_instr X | mm_dec : X -> nat -> mm_instr X Arguments mm_instr _%type_scope Arguments mm_inc [X]%type_scope Arguments mm_dec [X]%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
mm_steps_INC_inv : forall (k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, INCₐ x :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -[k'] -> st
mm_compute_DEC_0 : forall (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (k, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
mm_progress_DEC_0 : forall (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (k, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -+> st

mm_compute_DEC_S : forall (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st

subcode_sss_steps_inv_1 : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), st1 <> st3 -> one_step i st1 st2 -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st3 -> exists k' : nat, k = S k' /\ sss_steps one_step P k' st2 st3

mma_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1

sss_loop_sound : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (pre : data -> Prop) (spec : data -> data -> Prop) (f : data -> data) (C1 C2 : data -> Prop), (forall x : data, pre x -> {C1 x} + {C2 x}) -> forall i p : nat, (forall x : data, pre x -> C1 x -> sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (i, f x) /\ pre (f x)) -> (forall x : data, pre x -> C2 x -> exists y : data, sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (p, y) /\ spec x y) -> forall x : data, pre x -> (exists n : nat, C2 (iter f x n)) -> exists (n : nat) (y : data), sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (p, y) /\ spec (iter f x n) y

sss_loop_complete : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (pre : data -> Prop) (spec : data -> data -> Prop) (f : data -> data), (forall x : data, x <> f x) -> forall C1 C2 : data -> Prop, (forall x : data, pre x -> {C1 x} + {C2 x}) -> forall i p : nat, out_code p P -> (forall x : data, pre x -> C1 x -> sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (i, f x) /\ pre (f x)) ->...-> p = q /\ (exists n : nat, C2 (iter f x n) /\ spec (iter f x n) y)
in_mma_sss_dec_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)

sss_compute_step_out_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : code instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), st1 <> st2 -> out_code (fst st3) P -> sss_compute one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st3 -> exists q : nat, q < k /\ sss_steps one_step P q st2 st3
subcode_sss_subcode_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : code instr) (Q : nat * list instr) (p k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), out_code (fst st3) P -> P <sc Q -> sss_steps one_step P p st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step Q k st1 st3 -> exists q : nat, k = p + q /\ sss_steps one_step Q q st2 st3

VectorDef.splitat : forall l r : nat, vec ?A (l + r) -> vec ?A l * vec ?A r where ?A : [n : nat k : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n p : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- Type]

subcode_sss_progress_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : code instr) (Q : nat * list instr) (p : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), out_code (fst st3) P -> P <sc Q -> sss_progress one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step Q p st1 st3 -> exists q : nat, q < p /\ sss_steps one_step Q q st2 st3
VectorSpec.uncons_cons : forall (a : ?A) (v0 : vec ?A ?n), VectorDef.uncons (a ## v0) = (a, v0) where ?A : [n : nat k : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n p : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat k : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n p : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- nat]
subcode_sss_steps_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : code instr) (Q : nat * list instr) (k : nat) (st1 st3 : nat * data), P <sc Q -> in_code (fst st1) P -> out_code (fst st3) P -> sss_steps one_step Q k st1 st3 -> exists (k1 k2 : nat) (st2 : nat * data), sss_steps one_step P k1 st1 st2 /\ sss_steps one_step Q k2 st2 st3 /\ k = k1 + k2 /\ out_code (fst st2) P
sss_steps_stall_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (p : nat) (s1 s2 : nat * data), sss_step_stall one_step P s1 -> sss_steps one_step P p s1 s2 -> p = 0 /\ s1 = s2
subcode_cons_inj : forall (X : Type) (i : nat) (ρ δ : X) (P : code X), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> (i, δ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ = δ

``` 
intros k n P i x p v st H1 H2 H3 H4. 
intros H5 H6 H7.
pose (mm_sss_DEC_0 _ _ _ _ _ _ H1 H3) as H8.
pose (mm_sss_INC_inv _ _ _ _ _ H7) as [H9 H10].
pose (mm_sss_steps_inv _ _ _ _ _ H2 H6) as [k' [H11 [H12 H13]]].
exists k'. 
split.
- exact H11.
- apply H13.
Qed.
```

original: intros k n P i x p v st H1 H2 H3 H4. intros H5 H6 H7. pose (mm_sss_DEC_0 _ _ _ _ _ _ H1 H3) as H8.
